meanings.definition: The stage in embryonic development following the blastula, characterized by the formation of three germ layers.
meanings.sent1: During the development of the embryo, gastrulas form three germ layers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study gastrulas to understand how organisms grow.
meanings.sent3: The gastrulas at the science fair were a hit with the judges.
meanings.sent4: In nature, gastrulas are like tiny building blocks shaping life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the gastrulas looked like colorful puzzles coming together.
